block.p: A selective listing of state, county and local government events across New Jersey this week. (All dates and times subject to confirmation.) Items should be submitted by mail at least three weeks in advance to the New Jersey Op-Ed Page, The New York Times, 229 West 43rd Street, New York, N.Y. 10036, or by e-mail to njcivic@nytimes.com.
State of New Jersey

Trenton Assembly session. Monday, time to be announced. State House Annex Building, 150 West State Street. (609) 292-4840. Trenton Senate quorum. Monday at noon. State House Annex Building, 150 West State Street. (609) 292-4840.
Atlantic County
Mays Landing Board of Commissioners. Thursday at 6 p.m. Atlantic County Library, 40 Farragut Avenue. (609) 823-7904.
Bergen County

Emerson Planning Board. Thursday at 8 p.m. Emerson Borough Hall, 1 Municipal Place. (201) 262-7169, ext. 516. Hillsdale Planning Board. Tuesday at 7:30 p.m. Borough Hall, 380 Hillsdale Avenue. (201) 666-4800. Tenafly Historic Preservation. Thursday at 8 p.m. Tenafly Town Hall, 100 Riveredge Road. (201) 568-6100.
Camden County

Bellmawr Free flu shots. Monday from 3 p.m. to 5 p.m. Bellmawr Health Center, 35 Browning Road. Appointments available at (856) 931-2700. Gloucester City Free flu shots. Tuesday from 4 p.m. to 6 p.m. Gloucester City Health Center, 700 Monmouth Street. Appointments available at (856) 374-6248.
Cumberland County

Millvlle Zoning Board. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. 12 South High Street. (856) 825-7000. Titusville Affordable Housing Committee. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Hopewell Township Municipal Complex, 201 Washington Crossing-Pennington Road. (609) 737-1022.
Essex County

Maplewood Free rabies shots for dogs and cats. Saturday from 1:30 p.m. to 3 p.m. Maplewood Fire Headquarters, Dunnell Road. (973) 762-8120. Nutley Blood pressure screening. Tuesday from 1:30 p.m. to 3 p.m. Nutley Public Affairs Building, 149 Chestnut Street. (973) 284-4975. Verona Flu clinic. Wednesday from 2 p.m. to 4 p.m. Verona Community Center, 880 Bloomfield Avenue. Registration available at (973) 857-4800.
Hunterdon County

Asbury Township Committee. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Bethlehem Township Hall, 405 Mine Road. (908) 735-4107. Pittstown Board of Adjustment. Thursday at 7 p.m. Alexandria Township Hall, 21 Hog Hollow Road. (908) 996-7071.
Mercer County

Princeton Planning Board. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Princeton Town Council, 400 Witherspoon Street. (609) 924-5366. Trenton City Council. Tuesday at 5 p.m. Trenton City Hall, 319 East State Street. (609) 989-3187.
Monmouth County

Colts Neck Township Committee. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Colts Neck Town Hall, 124 Cedar Drive. (732) 462-5470. Wall Planning Board. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Wall Township Municipal Building, 2700 Allaire Road. (732) 449-8444.
Morris County

Morristown Board of Public Transportation. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. 30 Schuyler Place. (973) 829-8101. Morristown Cardiovascular health fair. Saturday from 8:30 a.m. to 1 p.m. Morristown Memorial Hospital, 100 Madison Avenue. Registration available at (800) 247-9580.
Ocean County

Brick Township Council. Tuesday at 7 p.m. Brick Township Municipal Building, 401 Chambersbridge Road. (732) 262-1000. Brick Free rabies clinic. Sunday from 10 a.m. to noon. Brick Township Public Works Garage, Ridge Road. (732) 262-1000.
Passaic County
Clifton Historical Commission. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Clifton Municipal Building, 900 Clifton Avenue. (973) 470-5757.
Somerset County

Belle Mead Planning Board. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Montgomery Township Municipal Building, 2261 Van Horne Road-Route 206 North. (908) 359-8211. Belle Mead Township Committee. Wednesday at 7 p.m. Montgomery Township Municipal Building, 2261 Van Horne Road-Route 206 North. (908) 359-8211. Rocky Hill Borough Council. Monday at 7:30 p.m. Rocky Hill Borough Hall, 15 Montgomery Avenue. (609) 924-7445.
Union County
Westfield Town Council. Tuesday at 8 p.m. Westfield Municipal Building, 425 Broad Street. (908) 789-4040.
Warren County

Allamuchy Board of Adjustment. Thursday at 7:30 p.m. Allamuchy Township Municipal Building, 292 Alphano Road. (908) 852-5132, ext. 24. Washington Land Use Board. Wednesday at 7:30 p.m. Washington Township Administrative Offices, 350 Route 57 West. (908) 689-7209.
